activities.loc: Branch 2 Courtroom, 2nd Floor, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dennis E. Meshigaud

defendant.name: Meshigaud, Dennis E.
defendant.address: 2058 Prairie Lane, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538

records.addlTxt:
3:24 PM Defendant Dennis E. Meshigaud in court. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is eligible for PD - searching for counsel. Defendant statement to counsel - waives right to counsel - waiver free and voluntary. Defendant pleads not guilty. Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over. Schiek states Information will be filed that mirrors Complaint. Meshigaud willing to proceed to Arraignment today; waives further reading and enters not guilty pleas. Defendant to make appointment with ADA Pfeifer. Bond continued. adj. 03:31 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report

3:12 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Dennis E. Meshigaud in court. 
Court questions defendant to status of counsel. Defendant statement.  Was found to be eligible but have not yet appointed counsel. 
Bail continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

1:36 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Dennis E. Meshigaud in court. 
Court statement to PD appointments.  Court adjourns for further appointment of counsel.
Bail continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:07 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Dennis E. Meshigaud appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Breanna Magallones appearing in court. Magallones states Defendant is eligible - there is conflict - searching for counsel. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Pfeifer/Magallones statement to bail. Defendant statement to charges in Vilas County. Magallones states Defendant will be waiving right to counsel in Vilas County cases. Court sets bond. adj. 02:11 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
